author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

PPS geometry (pps.xml) for Run3.  It involves just the file:

Geometry/VeryForwardData/data/2021/v1/pps.xml

#### PR validation:

The tests that were run is (even when some tests doesn't apply because there is no real code, only a XML file):

scram b runtests
scram b code-checks
scram b code-format
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos
with output:
34 33 32 26 16 4 1 1 1 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed
title: pps geometry (pps.xml) for Run3
